channel.title: Stop Brexit Party
channel.description: Recent content on Stop Brexit Party

item.title: Sign up for the Party
item.description: You should already have your invitation in the post. If you haven’t seen it or lost it, look it up here. Next, make an event for it - on Facebook, or by email - and invite your friends and neighbours.

item.title: Sick of Brexit? Lets Party
item.description: It’s been 3 years. The Brexit fanclub have been in charge of government and at the end of it we have a bad proposal and a plan to have not plans and keep us in the Brexit loop forever. Over 6 million people signed a petition to revoke Article 50 and stop Brexit dead. Now we have an EU Election to vote in, and every vote in that is a vote for the EU.
